table.name: account
table.remarks: This table contains global information and aggregate data for the account

column.name: acct_code
column.remarks: Identifies the account code of this GL account

column.name: year_num
column.remarks: Identifies the year of this account ledger's summary totals

column.name: bal_amt
column.remarks: Balance for the year for this period

column.name: stats_qty
column.remarks: The total quantity of this GL account for the given year

column.name: budg1_amt
column.remarks: The total budget for the year for this account

table.name: accountcur
table.remarks: This table contains global information and aggregate data for the account, converted to a specified currency

column.name: currency_code
column.remarks: The currency code to be reported on (W)

column.name: cmpy_code
column.remarks: The Company code of the required company

column.name: acct_code
column.remarks: The account code of the required account (W)

column.name: open_amt
column.remarks: The balance of this account at the beginning of the period

column.name: debit_amt
column.remarks: The total debits for the period

column.name: credit_amt
column.remarks: The total credits for the period

column.name: close_amt
column.remarks: The balance of this account at the end of the period

column.name: stats_qty
column.remarks: Total quantity of this account for the given period

column.name: pre_close_amt
column.remarks: The actual balance for this month

column.name: budg1_amt
column.remarks: The forecasted budget amount for this account for the given period

column.name: budg2_amt
column.remarks: The period budget2 allocated for this account

column.name: budg3_amt
column.remarks: The period budget3 allocated for this account

column.name: budg4_amt
column.remarks: The period budget4 allocated for this account

column.name: budg5_amt
column.remarks: The period budget5 allocated for this account

column.name: budg6_amt
column.remarks: The period budget6 allocated for this account

column.name: ytd_pre_close_amt
column.remarks: Running balance of the account for the YTD amount before any closing entries

column.name: acct_code
column.remarks: Account Code to reference the GL chart of accounts

column.name: jour_num
column.remarks: The specific journal batch number from which this account detail was created

column.name: jour_seq_num
column.remarks: The journal batch sequence from which this account detail entry was created

column.name: tran_date
column.remarks: Specific date entry was recorded in the system

column.name: ref_text
column.remarks: ID to provide original source info such as customer name, invoice #, etc.

column.name: ref_num
column.remarks: Document corresponding to reference ID, for sales, it would be an invoice

column.name: desc_text
column.remarks: Description of this account detail entry, CTRL N for notes

column.remarks: Amount of entry that is to be credited to this account

column.name: for_credit_amt

column.name: currency_code
column.remarks: The currency code of the ledger

column.remarks: Available settlement discount amount if paying within vendor terms

column.name: taken_disc_amt
column.remarks: The amount of Discount Taken on this voucher

column.name: paid_date
column.remarks: The Date the voucher was Paid

column.name: due_date
column.remarks: Date which payment of this invoice is due

column.name: disc_date
column.remarks: Date which settlement discounts for this invoice are available

column.name: post_flag
column.remarks: Transaction Posted to General Ledger. -(Y) Posted - (N) Not Posted

column.name: year_num
column.remarks: Accounting year which corresponds to this voucher

column.name: period_num
column.remarks: Accounting period which corresponds to this voucher

column.name: hold_code
column.remarks: Hold Pay code if on hold (W)

column.name: currency_code
column.remarks: The currency used for this vendor

column.name: conv_qty
column.remarks: Currency exchange rate for this transaction

column.name: withhold_tax_ind
column.remarks: 0 - Not applicable, 1 - cents, 2 - rounded down, 3 - rounded up

column.name: batch_num
column.remarks: The batch number of the voucher

column.name: vouch_code
column.remarks: Unique number automatically assigned by the system

column.name: line_num
column.remarks: Line number of this distribution within the voucher

column.name: type_ind
column.remarks: G-General, A-Chrg Thru Sale, P-Purch Ord, J-Dist to Job, S-Shipment, W-Order

column.name: acct_code
column.remarks: Enter the General Ledger account code

column.name: desc_text
column.remarks: Description of transaction - CTRL-N for Notes

column.name: dist_amt
column.remarks: Amount of resource to be distributed by this voucher

column.name: res_code
column.remarks: Enter resource code to distribute to voucher - (W)

column.name: job_code
column.remarks: Enter job code to which distribute voucher - (W)

column.name: act_code
column.remarks: Activity code of job to which distribute voucher - (W)

column.name: trans_qty
column.remarks: Quantity of resource units to which distribute voucher

column.name: cost_amt
column.remarks: Amount of this cost invoiced for this shipment

column.name: charge_amt
column.remarks: Unit charge rate of resource in Base Currency

column.name: vouch_code
column.remarks: Voucher Number you wish payment be applied to

column.name: seq_num
column.remarks: Line number associated with the specific debit

column.name: pay_date
column.remarks: Date application of this cheque was made

column.name: pay_num
column.remarks: Number to uniquely identify and reference this cheque

column.name: apply_num
column.remarks: Identifies the number of payments applied against this remittance

column.name: apply_amt
column.remarks: Actual amount you wish to be applied to this voucher

column.name: disc_amt
column.remarks: Dollar amount, if given, for discount to this voucher

column.name: waregrp_code
column.remarks: Unique code to identify a Warehouse Group Code

column.name: cartage_ind
column.remarks: Cartage/Freight - Enter 1 for component of price or 2 to charge seperate

column.name: conv_uom_ind
column.remarks: Enter 'Y' to convert UOM or 'N' to not convert UOM

column.name: contact_text
column.remarks: Name or title of warehouse main contact

column.name: tele_text
column.remarks: Telephone number of the warehouse or contact person

column.name: connote_flag
column.remarks: Generate and print the consignment note automatically

column.name: ship_label_flag
column.remarks: Generate and print the shipping labels automatically

column.name: acct_mask_code
column.remarks: Enter valid segment codes or leave blank

column.name: pick_reten_num
column.remarks: Number of days of to hold the picking list

column.name: cart_area_code
column.remarks: The cartage area for this location (W)

routine.name: batchhead_check_balance(decimal,decimal,decimal,decimal)
routine.definition: create procedure batchhead_check_balance(debit_amt DECIMAL (16,2),credit_amt DECIMAL (16,2),for_debit_amt DECIMAL (16,2),for_credit_amt DECIMAL (16,2)); IF debit_amt <> credit_amt OR for_debit_amt <> for_credit_amt THEN RAISE EXCEPTION -746, 0, 'batchead: debit <> credit or for_debit <> for_credit'; END IF END PROCEDURE;

routine.name: systdist(integer,integer)
routine.definition:
create dba procedure informix.systdist (table_id int, column_no int) returning int, datetime year to fraction (5), char(1), smallfloat, smallfloat, float , stat, char(1);
define v_tabauth char(8); define v_colauth char(3); define is_allowed int; define search_columns int; define v_colno smallint; define v_seqno int; define v_constr_time datetime year to fraction(5); define v_mode char(1); define v_resolution smallfloat; define v_confidence smallfloat; define v_encdat stat; define v_owner char(8); define user procedure; define v_stattype char(1); define v_smplsize float; define v_rolename varchar(32);
-- First verify that the current user has select privileges on this column
let is_allowed = 0; let search_columns = 0;
if user = 'informix' then let is_allowed = 1; else -- Check sysusers to see if the usertype is 'D', ie., the -- current user has dba privileges and may see any columns. select usertype into v_mode from informix.sysusers where username = user; if v_mode = 'D' then let is_allowed = 1; else -- See if the user owns the table, and therefore can see the columns. select owner into v_owner from informix.systables where tabid = table_id; if v_owner = user then let is_allowed = 1; end if end if end if
if is_allowed = 0 then foreach select tabauth into v_tabauth from informix.systabauth where tabid = table_id and (grantee = user or grantee = 'public') if substr(v_tabauth, 1, 1) = 's' or substr(v_tabauth, 1, 1) = 'S' then let is_allowed = 1; exit foreach; elif substr(v_tabauth, 3, 1) = '*' then let search_columns = 1; end if end foreach end if
-- Search syscolauth only if user does not have select -- privileges on all columns. If the user has no select -- privileges on any column, then we need search no further.
if is_allowed = 0 and search_columns = 1 then foreach select colauth into v_colauth from informix.syscolauth where tabid = table_id and colno = column_no and (grantee = user or grantee = 'public') if substr(v_colauth, 1, 1) = 's' or substr(v_colauth, 1, 1) = 'S' then let is_allowed = 1; exit foreach; end if end foreach end if
-- Check user's current role for privileges on table and columns if is_allowed = 0 then select CURRENT_ROLE into v_rolename from informix.systables where tabid = 1;
if v_rolename is NOT NULL then -- Check if user's current role has select privilege on table, -- and hence can see the columns foreach select tabauth into v_tabauth from informix.systabauth where tabid = table_id and grantee = v_rolename if substr(v_tabauth, 1, 1) = 's' or substr(v_tabauth, 1, 1) = 'S' then let is_allowed = 1; exit foreach; elif substr(v_tabauth, 3, 1) = '*' then let search_columns = 1; end if end foreach
-- Search syscolauth only if user's current role does not have select -- privileges on all columns. If the user's current role has no select -- privileges on any column, then we need search no further.
if is_allowed = 0 and search_columns = 1 then foreach select colauth into v_colauth from informix.syscolauth where tabid = table_id and colno = column_no and grantee = v_rolename if substr(v_colauth, 1, 1) = 's' or substr(v_colauth, 1, 1) = 'S' then let is_allowed = 1; exit foreach; end if end foreach end if end if end if
-- Return with no rows found if not allowed to select from -- the column designated by (tabid,colno).
if is_allowed = 0 then raise exception -272; end if
-- Now find the distribution rows
foreach select seqno, constr_time, mode, resolution, confidence, smplsize, encdat, type into v_seqno, v_constr_time, v_mode, v_resolution, v_confidence, v_smplsize, v_encdat, v_stattype from informix.sysdistrib where tabid = table_id and colno = column_no order by seqno return v_seqno, v_constr_time, v_mode, v_resolution, v_confidence, v_smplsize, v_encdat, v_stattype with resume; end foreach
-- Engine will return 100 to user
end procedure;
